title:
Global well-posedness of arbitrarily large Lipschitz solutions for the
  Muskat problem with surface tension
abstract:
We prove a global well-posedness result for the 2D Muskat problem with
surface tension. Given any regular enough initial data which is small in some
critical space but possibly large in Lipschitz, we prove that the associated
Cauchy problem has a unique global solution. Our result allows for the slope of
the interface between the two fluids to be arbitrarily large.
